unnormalised: Organic farming is awesome! My Kisaan Chachi from Bihar swear by it since 2010. Less chemicals is a win. Heard IIT Kanpur is doing research too. Hope more farmers like Ramlal adopt it. Less yield initially, maybe, but better for our Bharat Mata long term! Think we need more subsidies maybe by 26/01/2024? 14:00 hrs tea break thoughts. Definitely worth considering for healthier rotis by 10/10/2023!
normalised: Organic farming is awesome! My Kisan Chachi from Bihar swear by it since two thousand and ten. Less chemicals is a win. Heard I I T Kanpur is doing research too. Hope more farmers like Ramlal adopt it. Less yield initially, maybe, but better for our Bharat Mata long term! Think we need more subsidies maybe by twenty sixth january two thousand and twenty four? fourteen zero zero hours tea break thoughts. Definitely worth considering for healthier rotis by tenth october two thousand and twenty three!
